GisIRing Class Reference

#include <IRing.h>

Inherits GisIRingAbstract.

Inheritance diagram for GisIRing:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

The GisIRing class is ring Geometry helper type. This is the most general non-abstract ring type. GisIRing is defined by an ordered collection of contiguous curve segments.

Definition at line 33 of file IRing.h.
